createIndexTables module

createIndexTables.createChapterTables(scientisst_nb_dir)

Creates a Markdown file in the each chapter directory with a complete index table, comprehending all existing notebooks from that chapter

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

createIndexTables.createIndexTables(scientisst_nb_dir)

Calls necessary fucntions to create a Master Index Table and an Index Table for each chapter.

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

createIndexTables.createMasterTable(scientisst_nb_dir)

Creates a Markdown file in the ScientISST Notebooks repository with a complete index table, comprehending all existing notebooks

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

createIndexTables.getNBInfoFromChapter(md_file, dir, master_table=True)

Finds notebooks in a directory, collects relevant information from each, and writes it on the MasterTable document.

Parameters

  • md_file – Markdown file

  • dir (string) – Path to a chapter directory in ScientISST Notebooks

createIndexTables.get_metadata(cell)

Finds author and date of last update of a ScientISST Notebook

Parameters

cell – Markdown cell containing the metadata from a ScientISST Notebook

Returns

  • (string) - Notebook authors

  • (string) - Date of last update of the ScientISST Notebook (dd/mm/aaaa)

Return type

tuple

createIndexTables.get_tags(cell)

Finds keywords/tags from a ScientISST Notebook

Parameters

cell – Markdown cell containing the keywords from a ScientISST Notebook

Returns

(string) - Notebook tags

Return type

tuple

createIndexTables.remove_html(cell)

Removes html elements from a Markdown cell

Parameters

cell – Markdown cell

Returns

Cell content (aka source) without html elements

Return type

string
